name: 蔡逸萍
objective:
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE WORKING LANGUAGES OF THIS INTERPRETING TRAINING COURSE ARE ENGLISH AND CHINESE.

The course aims to provide students with practical insight into different modes of interpreting. Practical exercises aimed at developing active listening, memory, quick reflexes, gist extraction and note-taking skills will be introduced. This course centres around the training of English-Chinese sight translation and consecutive interpreting and uses general and technical speeches in politics, business, world affairs and other fields.
